title: Persona -trinity soul-
overview: Persona -trinity soul- takes place ten years after the end of Persona 3. It is set in Ayanagi City, a city located near the Sea of Japan, and its police force begins to investigate several cases involving a mysterious illness called the Apathy Syndrome. In the midst of the crisis, two brothers named Shin and Jun Kanzato move back to Ayanagi to see their elder brother Ry≈ç, who is now the Superintendent of the Ayanagi City Police. It has been ten years since the three siblings last met with each other.
